title: No! Priyanka Chopra has not joined RSS; here’s the fact check | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A photo of actress Priyanka Chopra wearing Khakhi shorts has surfaced on social media, claiming that she has joined RSS.

The caption of the picture read: “Priyanka join the RSS”

We found another post with the caption: “Priyanka Chopra Leaves After Attending A Very Important RSS Meeting..!!”

When the fact-checking team at NewsMobile did a fact check, we found that the claim is FAKE.

We found an article dated June 17, 2019, in which it is mentioned that the picture is taken in New York.

On putting the keywords like ‘Priyanka Chopra’, ‘RSS’ on Google, we did not find any reports of her joining the social organisation.

Hence, it proves that the picture has been taken in New York and Priyanka hasn’t joined RSS.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
